actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution making appointments to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, the Committee on Governmental Affairs, and the Committee on Veterans Affairs.

summary.text: Appoints Senator Akaka to serve as a member on the Senate Committees on Energy and Natural Resources, on Governmental Affairs, and on Veterans' Affairs for the 101st Congress.

titles.title: A resolution making appointments to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, the Committee on Governmental Affairs, and the Committee on Veterans Affairs.
